cgcloud__User_Document__c.name: cgcloud__User_Document__c
cgcloud__User_Document__c.description: Stores the details of the daily report object.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Creation_Date__c.description: Date of initiation of the daily report.

cgcloud__Responsible__c.description: Reference to the user who's responsible for the user document.

cgcloud__Template_Description__c.description: Description of the daily report template.

cgcloud__Total_Duration_Min__c.description: Indicates the sum of activities in minutes.

cgcloud__Total_Working_Duration_Min__c.description: Total working duration in minutes (difference of work time from and work time thru).

cgcloud__User_Document_Template__c.description: Reference to the user document template.

cgcloud__Workflow__c.description: Reference to the workflow that the corresponding daily report uses.
